summary: An ESP file with improvements to Proudspire Manor in Solitude focusing on making the cellar as conveniently laid out as possible, with all the crafting equipment you would ever need and plenty of storage containers.
descriptionHtml:
This is an ESP file with improvements to Proudspire Manor in Solitude. My main focus has been to make the cellar as conveniently laid out as possible, with all the crafting equipment you would ever need and plenty of storage containers (detailed list at the bottom of this description). 

[b]WARNING:[/b] I haven\'t removed any of the original container objects, but it might be a good idea to do a backup of your save files nevertheless, so that you can check that all your equipment is still in place.

This mod also includes the changes made in Awl393\'s excellent [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8633]Proudspire Manor Fix[/url] - one of the first mods I installed. Described by Awl393 as follows:[quote]This is an ESP file made with Creation Kit that fixes the double chairs on the second floor, the wall clipping behind the mannequins in the basement and the backwards chest in the master bedroom. It also adds a second chest to the left of the enchanting table in the basement.[/quote]
Here is a list of improvements added in this mod, in addition to misc. decorations and removement of clutter.

[b]Ground floor[/b]
- Mannequin

[b]Cellar[/b]

Cellar entrance:
- 5 shield plaques
- Wardrobe

Alchemy section:
- Wood chopping block (for those of you that use an arrow smithing mod)
- Barrel (for potions/food/misc)
- Apothecary\'s satchel (for ingredients)
- Small chest (for recipes/misc.)
- Cooking spit

Former housecarl room, made into smithing section:
- Smelter
- Workbench
- Anvil
- Grindstone
- Tanning rack
- Weapon rack (4 slots)
- Shield plaque
- Mannequin
- Chest (for ingots/misc)

Enchanting section:
- Safe (for jewelry/misc)
- Strong box (for soul gems/gems)
- End table (for letters/misc) with Shrine of Talos
- Chest (added by Awl393\'s Proudspire Manor Fix )

Weapon rack nook and stairway
- Bedroll (owned by player)
- Chest (for weapons/armor/misc)
- Bookcase (unlimited storage)
- Weapon plaque
- 2 shield plaques
author: prackspoor
